title: 28 Days Later, Vol. 1: London Calling
description: The film that changed horror forever continues here! Selena and her new comrades struggle against the infected, the American presence in the UKâ€¦and themselves. Selena is a survivor but even she must give pause when the mission has her breaking into the land she fought so hard to get out of. Collects Comics #1-4
author: Michael Alan Nelson
